name: Donut Empire
description:
This game is about making donuts. You have to earn money by building a town, the town will automatically upgrade if another town or a factory is placed next to it. You have 30 moves available at the start.

Starter Guide:

- After starting a game, click the shop icon.

- Open the second tab in the shop window.

- Buy two grain fields.

- Click on the third tab in the shop window.

- Buy a town.

- Click on the play button to continue moves.

- If you have enough money buy a windmill next to your village

Have fun! Hope you enjoy.
